CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Elderly Population relative to Rural Communities?
SRP.A: Elderly Population is {above} Rural Communities in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rural Communities relative to Students?
SRP.A: Rural Communities is {below} Students in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Students relative to Elderly Population?
SRP.A: Students is {above} Elderly Population in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Rural Communities}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Students}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Elderly Population's maximum Technology Adoption Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Elderly Population's maximum Technology Adoption Rate is in {1962}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Students's maximum Technology Adoption Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Students's maximum Technology Adoption Rate is in {1963}.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1972, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1961 and 1972 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Technology Adoption Rate in 1970 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total technology adoption rate in 1970 was {lower} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Technology Adoption Rate in 1967 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total technology adoption rate in 1967 was {lower} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1975, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1964 and 1974?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1966 and 1975 was {larger} than between 1964 and 1974.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Rural Communities} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Students and Elderly Population first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Students and Elderly Population first exchanged leading positions in {1961}.
